channel.title: 2 major questions
channel.description: How do i change where a player starts off and goes when he dies and how do i change exp rate of npcs and dummies???

item.title: 2 major questions
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

player.java, search for

initial x and y coordinates

then change them for start point

dying:
search in client.java for

public void applydead

edit the coords, and same for

public void youdied

exp rates of dummies, search for

case ###:

replace ### with the id of the dummy, edit the number it gives in

addSkillXP

for npcs, search for

if (FightType != 3) {

and edit the equation it gives you

Read full topic
